thread.title_full: Watch the new story trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: Watch the new story trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 - Gaming
text: The latest trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops III is all about the first-person shooter's story.Set in a dark and gritty future, the game introduces a new breed of Black Ops soldier where the lines have been blurred between humanity and military technology.Players will be tasked with navigating the hot spots of a new Cold War to find their missing comrades. "While much has changed, one thing remains the same: everything you know may be wrong," reads a game description addressed to fans of the series."How far down the rabbit hole are you willing to go to uncover the disturbing truth?"Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 is set to launch on November 6 for PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4.It will also be available on Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3, but those versions will not offer the definitive experience.Call of Duty: Black Ops 3: Everything we know so far including the beta, trailers and ZombiesCheck out our most anticipated games of September, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
